steps.text: Iceman, this is N443DF, do you copy?
N443DF, this is Iceman, go ahead.
Iceman, N443DF, weâ€™ll need a full body Type 1 deicing today.
Copy that N443DF, you are requesting full body Type 1. Please prepare the aircraft for deicing.
Iceman, aircraft N443DF ready for deicing. Engines running, APU is off.
Aircraft N443DF, copy that. Engines running and APU off, full body Type 1 requested. Starting application now.
Go ahead, Iceman, for aircraft N443DF.
Yes, N443DF, deicing complete. Post-deicing check complete, personnel and equipment are clear.
Iceman, aircraft N443DF copies. Thank you for your help and stay warm out there!
